sub_title: Future insights | Strategic Foresight | Design Research | Innovation | Business Value
summary:
I'm a highly experienced Strategic Futurist and Design Researcher with an expertise in socio-cultural long-term trend research. I'm passionate about creating sustainable impact driven by design research and innovation. 

Throughout my career, I've gained extensive experience in developing, coordinating, and conducting research in the context of various industries and topics with the emphasis on health, healthcare, and wellbeing. I collaborate with internal and external experts to identify and analyze changes and trends that result in future insights. My ability to synthesize research findings into clear and compelling insights and recommendations for innovation has been recognized by senior leadership. 

As a strategic thinker with strong analytical skills, I'm able to lead research projects and teams to ensure the timely delivery of high-quality insights. I am highly skilled in design thinking, innovation management, and emerging technologies. 

I'm excited to continue my career in user experience design and research, and I'm eager to collaborate with cross-functional teams to create meaningful experiences. Feel free to reach out to me at claulieshout@hotmail.com to discuss how I can contribute to your team. 

Principal Design Researcher | User Experience Design | Trend Research | Health and Wellbeing | Innovation Management | Design Research Methods | Strategic Thinking  | Analytical Skills | Emerging Technologies

certifications.name: Professional certificate in Foresight
certifications.authority: UH College of Technology Department of Human Development and Consumer Science

organizations.name: Fontys Creative Industries - Trend Research & Concept Creation in Lifestyle

profile_positions.description:
•	Leading, coordinating, scoping, and conducting socio-cultural long-term trend research on impactful changes in the context of health, healthcare, and wellbeing with an emphasis on planet and people, resulting in future experience insights and activation through the Philips Innovation Community 
•	Collaborating with an internal and external network of experts to conduct research 
•	Leading and managing research projects to ensure timely delivery of high-quality insights 
•	Developing and refining research methods and tools to meet evolving business needs 
•	Synthesizing research findings into clear and compelling insights and recommendations 
•	Presenting research findings to senior leadership and cross functional teams 
•	Conducting research on emerging technologies and their potential impact on the healthcare industry & society
profile_positions.title: Principal Design Research

profile_positions.description:
•	Directing, coordinating, and conducting CultureScan, a global annual trend study on cultural expressions in different regions indicating change, in order to inform, inspire, and activate Philips businesses 
•	Synthesizing trend research findings into clear and compelling insights and recommendations 
•	Presenting trends to senior leadership and crossfunctional teams 
•	Collaborating with colleagues across multiple functions to ensure research insights are incorporated into business strategy and decision-making 
•	Conducting competitor analysis to identify emerging trends and market opportunities 
•	Managing relationships with external research partners and vendors 
•	Developing and delivering training programs to build internal research capabilities
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant Trend Research

profile_positions.description:
•	Defining and articulating market specific aesthetic trends for the total Philips product portfolio as well as external clients and translating these into advice of colour, material, and finish palettes. 
•	Developing colour, material, and finish concepts into test samples in collaboration with Philips suppliers 
•	Collaborating with designers and product managers to ensure user needs are incorporated into product design.
profile_positions.title: Visual Trend Analyst
